page.title: 15A CHILD'S TIME IN PROBUS
page.content: {A Child's Time in Probus.} My name is Sarah,I am ten years old and go to Probus School.I walk there and cross the road with the lollipop lady.3 days a week we have assembly and on the other 2 we have English until playtime.We then do maths until dinner and playtime.In the afternoon we do project work,science or craft.Sometimes we play rounders in the field.I walk home with a friend and have a drink and biscuits.If it is nice I go out to play but if it is rainy I stay indoors & watch T.V.At weekends we sometimes go to the beach if it is fine on Saturday afternoons & all day on Sundays when we take a picnic lunch.If it is not nice we stay at home & I sometimes help mum & tidy my room.
